amendment.description: Amendment requires the Task Force to take into consideration existing private sector, State, and local government efforts related to pain management and prescribing pain medication.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part A of House Report 114-551 to ensure the task force takes into consideration existing private sector, State, and local government efforts related to pain management and prescribing pain medication.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Sessions.
